sentences.sentence: A number of churches were looted and sacrilegious acts committed.
sentences.translation: 许多教堂被洗劫了，还发生了亵渎行为。

sentences.sentence: Many of his actions, contrary to all tradition, seemed sacrilegious to the people.
sentences.translation: 他的很多行为都与传统相反，别人眼中看上去是亵渎神灵。

sentences.sentence: My suggestion was sacrilegious because automakers have long been secretive about design.
sentences.translation: 我的建议非常的前卫，因为汽车制造商一直在进行偷偷摸摸的设计工作。
